outline:
1. to strip, strip off, lay bare, make bare, draw out
    1. (Qal)
      1. to strip off
      2. to strip, lay bare
      3. to draw (water), skim, take from the surface
kjv_def: make bare, clean, discover, draw out, take, uncover.
strongs_def: to strip off, i.e. generally to make naked (for exertion or in disgrace), to drain away or bail up (a liquid)
